author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Michigan gov. plans to extend parts of stay-at-home order while likely easing others
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said her state’s restrictive stay-at-home order is effectively flattening the curve in the number of coronavirus cases and that she plans to issue an executive order that will extend restrictions while likely permitting some for…
content: WASHINGTON Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said Thursday that her states restrictive stay-at-home order is effectively slowing the rate of coronavirus infections and that she plans to issue an executive order that will extend restrictions while likely permitti… [+2107 chars]
